desc.cn: Quarkus 是用于编写 Java 应用程序的云原生、（Linux）容器优先的框架
desc.en: Quarkus is a Cloud Native, (Linux) Container First framework for writing Java applications

/curl.cmd:
curl -Ls https://sh.jbang.dev | bash -s - trust add https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/io/quarkus/quarkus-cli/
&& curl -Ls https://sh.jbang.dev | bash -s - app install --fresh --force quarkus@quarkusio

win/powershell.cmd:
x pwsh iex "& { $(iwr https://ps.jbang.dev) } trust add https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/io/quarkus/quarkus-cli/"
&& x pwsh  iex "& { $(iwr https://ps.jbang.dev) } app install --fresh --force quarkus@quarkusio"
